metadata.title: CVE-2020-26950 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.description:
In certain circumstances, the MCallGetProperty opcode can be emitted withunmet assumptions resulting in an exploitable use-after-free condition.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 82.0.3, Firefox ESR < 78.4.1, andThunderbird < 78.4.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26950` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 82.0.3+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '82.0.3+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1').
